showScoreExcerpt:
“ ‘The Cottage’ would have worked better as simply an outright farcical comedy with no attempt at seriousness. It is fast-paced with props used very cleverly to create humor. That by itself would have worked without a nod to female independence and the few introspective moments.”

Read more
